name: Gromen
description:
Lords of the Hedge
The Gromen are a minotaur culture known for legendary stubbornness and brutal combat traditions. They do not fear death and settle disputes through physical contests.

options.name: Blood Fury
options.description: In response to being the Target of a True Hit that deals Physical Damage, you enter a Blood Fury until you make your next Melee Attack. If the Attack hits, it is automatically upgraded to a True Hit. Until you make that Attack, you automatically fail all Defense Checks.

options.name: Stubborn Presence
options.description: Gain +1 Presence and you cannot be involuntarily moved or intimidated by creatures smaller than you.

options.name: Brutal Resilience
options.description: Gain +1 Resilience and you can continue acting normally while at 0 health without spending resolve.
